dict.acceptation: 砍，剁，排骨；公章，官印，出港证，登陆护照，旅行护照；掌劈；〈口〉牌号，商标，品种，品质，等级；
劈，砍，剁；切细，剁碎；辟（路），开（路）前进；（风，浪）骤变，突变；

sent.orig: CHOP and radiotherapy were the main treatment method.
sent.trans: 治疗上则以CHOP方案化疗及放疗为主。

sent.orig: All patients received chemotherapy of CHOP regimen.
sent.trans: 化、放疗联合治疗和单纯化疗患者均采用标准chop方案化疗。

sent.orig: The chemotherapy regimen consisted of 2～8 cycles of COP, COMP, CHOP or BACOP regimen.
sent.trans: 放疗前、中、后行COP、comp、CHOP、BACOP方案化疗2～8个疗程。

sent.orig: Compare cut, saw, chop, hack, slash and tear.
